Summary: A VERY BRIGHT RED GLOWING OBJECT,BLINKING SEVERAL TIMES
divs: Sighting Detailsi WAS CLOSING THE BLINDS LOOKING OUT, THERE IN TREE LEVEL SIGHT THERE WAS A HUGE RED AND WHITE ORB MOVING ACCROSS THE TREE. i WATCHED IT , CALLED MY SON TO LOOK IT WAS GONE. i WENT TO MY BACK PORCH WE LOOKED BUT IT NEVER RETURNED.
